name: Ninja Forms – Add-on Manager
author: The WP Ninjas

sections.description:
The Ninja Forms Add-on Manager allows you to install any purchased Ninja Forms add-ons without a zip file. It also installs and activates licenes automatically, so there’s no need to copy/paste licenses.

Installation

=

  1. Install and activate Ninja Forms
  2. Visit your Ninja Forms plugin dashboard (the place where all your forms are listed)
  3. Click on the Services tab, then click Setup in the Add-on Manager section
sections.faq:
Q. Is this the final release of the plugin?
A. No. The Ninja Forms Add-on Manager is currently in an open beta.

Q. Who can use the Ninja Forms Add-on Manager?
A. Anyone who has purchased a Ninja Forms add-on can install it using this plugin.
sections.changelog:
3.0.13

  • Fixed a false-positive version check.

3.0.12

  • Updated the package download URL.

3.0.11

  • Initial release.
